title: Mental Verbs with Abstractions
goal: Review which mental verbs take which abstractions.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

All 8 vocabulary words:

fail → ?       interrupt → ?
begin → ?      prevent → ?
end → ?        recur → ?
stop → ?       repeat → ?

(Answers: fliba, dicra, cfari, fanta, fanmo, krefu, sisti, rapli)

New Material (5-7 min)

Mental Verbs and Their Abstractions

Verb Meaning Takes Example
djuno know du'u mi djuno lo du'u do klama
jimpe understand du'u mi jimpe lo du'u ti xamgu
djica want nu mi djica lo nu citka
pacna hope nu mi pacna lo nu do snada
terpa fear nu mi terpa lo nu fliba
nelci like nu/ka mi nelci lo ka cadzu
cfari begin nu mi cfari lo nu gunka
sisti stop nu mi sisti lo nu tavla
troci try nu mi troci lo nu snada
snada succeed nu mi snada lo nu klama

Pattern: du'u for Facts, nu for Events

du'u — verbs about knowing, believing, asserting:

  • djuno, jimpe, xusra, tugni, natfe

nu — verbs about actions, desires, attempts:

  • djica, pacna, terpa, cfari, sisti, troci, snada

Examples

mi djuno lo du'u do prami mi

I know that you love me.

mi djica lo nu do prami mi

I want you to love me.

mi pacna lo nu mi snada lo nu cilre

I hope I succeed in learning.

Key Point

Use du'u with knowledge verbs, nu with action/desire verbs.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Match Verb to Abstractor

Fill in du'u or nu:

  1. mi djuno lo ___ do klama
  2. mi djica lo ___ citka
  3. mi jimpe lo ___ ti vajni
  4. mi terpa lo ___ fliba
Answers
  1. du'u (know)
  2. nu (want)
  3. du'u (understand)
  4. nu (fear)

Exercise 2: Translate

Translate:

  1. I know you work.
  2. I want to sleep.
  3. I hope you understand.
  4. I try to succeed.
Answers
  1. mi djuno lo du'u do gunka
  2. mi djica lo nu sipna
  3. mi pacna lo nu do jimpe
  4. mi troci lo nu snada

Exercise 3: Complex Sentences

Translate:

  1. I know you want to go.
  2. I hope I begin to understand.
  3. I fear I will fail to try.
Answers
  1. mi djuno lo du'u do djica lo nu klama
  2. mi pacna lo nu mi cfari lo nu jimpe
  3. mi terpa lo nu mi fliba lo nu troci

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I know you go." → mi djuno lo du'u do klama
  2. "I want to work." → mi djica lo nu gunka
  3. "I try to succeed." → mi troci lo nu snada

Today's Review

Abstractor selection:

Verb Type Abstractor
Know, understand, believe du'u
Want, hope, fear, try nu
Like (as quality) ka

Summary

You reviewed which mental verbs take which abstractions. Knowledge verbs use du'u; action/desire verbs use nu.
